segments.text: Hi , did you call for an exterminator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ! Thank goodness you ’ re here.These bugs are driving us crazy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sort of pest are we dealing with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We just bought this house and it is infected with just about everything . We have termites in the wood , cockroaches all over the place , and last night I saw a huge rat out in the backyard !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there ’ s nothing we can ’ t handle . I ’ ll spray the floorboards and walls to get rid of the cockroaches , but the termites will be harder to get rid of . We will have to cover the entire house and fumigate it . Unfortunately that means you will have to find a place to stay for the next three days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , just get rid of the bugs !
segments.speaker: S2
